title: 599: BITCOIN HITS STOCK-TO-FLOW REBOUND LEVEL NOT SEEN SINCE 2017 ATH!! CRYPTO TO TRANSFORM 4 INDUSTRIES!
description:
Deviation from the stock-to-flow average has always resulted in a reversal to new all-time highs, data shows. Both 2013 and 2017 ultimately saw a two-tier run to an all-time high. PlanB still believes that $100,000 per Bitcoin will appear this year, while stock-to-flow calls for either a $100,000 or $288,000 average price between now and 2024.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
